title: Sound Options
body: Just a small thing, but its something I had in the old client. I like to have to music off and the sound effects low. However in champ select, even with the SFX volume low, the champ phrases are still really loud.

replies.body:
You can disable the Champion Selection music and adjust the SFX volume by:

Click the Settings icon on the top-right of your client.
Select _Sound_ on the left side of the menu.
Un-check _Enable Champion Selection Music_.
Adjust the SFX volume accordingly.

Or just turn the overall volume of the Alpha client by using the Volume Mixer.

_P.S. Everytime I update the Alpha client, the volume on the Volume Mixer always resets back to 100 and blow my eardrums off._

{{champion:17}}

I have the same issue. They are super scary loud. Even with all sound turned down so low I can't hear it when a game pops (it's the visual on my taskbar that alerts me) once in champ select, the volume of the voices is still very very high.
